FuncDef: The display diagnostic-information command displays diagnostic information about the current system. The display diagnostic-information command displays diagnostic information about the current system.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays diagnostic file information for the specified module.
-

Displays diagnostic file information in a specified slot.
The value displayed on the device prevails.

Specifies the name of the file that stores diagnostic information.
The value is a string of 5 to 64 characters.
By default, the file path is flash:/ and the file name extension must be .txt or .zip.

ExtraInfo: When a fault occurs in the system, if it is difficult to determine the module that causes the fault, you can use this command to collect diagnostics information for locating the fault.
